metadata.author: Office of Personnel Management
metadata.subject: Charles S. Phalen, Jr. is the Director of the National Background Investigations Bureau. In this..role, he reports to the OPM Director and leads a newly established entity within the U.S. Office..of Personnel Management, a government-wide service provider for background investigations...He also partners with the Department of Defense, which is responsible for designing, building,..securing, and operating the NBIB information technology systems.
metadata.title: Charles S. Phalen Jr Print Bio
metadata.creator: Office of Personnel Management
metadata.description: Charles S. Phalen, Jr. is the Director of the National Background Investigations Bureau. In this..role, he reports to the OPM Director and leads a newly established entity within the U.S. Office..of Personnel Management, a government-wide service provider for background investigations...He also partners with the Department of Defense, which is responsible for designing, building,..securing, and operating the NBIB information technology systems.
